resources.string: Please choose your weekly amount of meat:
Weekly consumption in the last 28 days (Ø):
Okay, stay calm! You are misusing MeatAccount…
If you want to be a vegetarian, you do not need MeatAccount anymore.
Statistics are available\nafter your first week.
Enter your current meat consumption in grams:
Since your first week you have eaten\n
The CO2 emissions you have saved are equivalent to driving\n
Are you sure you want to reset your meat account completely? You will no longer be able to access your old data!
You can\'t give up 100g of meat, otherwise you\'ll overdraw your account…
Days since your last meat consumption:
With the water you have saved, you could fill\n
of new meat transferred to your meat account!
You have been added new meat to your meat account. Come and have a look!
Channel to be reminded of new meat

Welcome to MeatAccount!

MeatAccount helps you track and systematically reduce your meat consumption.

The planet will thank you for it!
You will open your first meat account right away!\n\nYour set weekly amount of meat will then be transferred to you at the same time every week!
Whenever you eat meat from now on, you deduct the corresponding amount of meat from your meat account. from your meat account.\n\nIt\'s easy!
In your statistics you can see live what impact your renunciation has on the environment!
Invalid code. Please try another code.
A code has been generated from your current MeatAccount. Paste it when creating a new account to transfer your current account:
Code was copied to your clipboard.
